Pre-Game Insights: The BBC has the rights to the match, with coverage beginning at 4pm and featuring Gary Lineker and Alan Shearer.
ITV has the rights to the other Euro 2024 quarter-final between the Netherlands and Turkey, which kicks off at 8pm.
The channel assignment is decided by the broadcasters before the tournament, with ITV choosing the second semi-final and BBC selecting the quarter-final featuring Switzerland.
Miscellaneous Highlights: BBC's games are available on its iPlayer platform, while ITV's are on ITVX.
Others: The article discusses the historical performance of England on BBC and ITV, with better results on BBC.
